pages.text: Hot enough for ya?$(p)Make a 5x5 sandstone base. On the next layer, put sandstone around the edge and fill with water. Put 2-high pillers in all four corners. Throw in a scarab to create the orange portal.$(p)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/atum)Click here to read more about Atum$(/l)
